name: Quadratum
description: Also known as the Afterworld. In this unfamiliar new city full of life and tall skyscrappers, Sora will have to learn what is this place, how he arrived here and why the Heartless are also threatening the peaceful lives of the citizens of Quadratum. This new world doesn't belong neither to the light, dark or in-between, but to another plane of existence. Under Ansem the Wise's perspective, it could be the Unreality, a world of fiction.

name: Forest Moon of Endor
media: Star Wars Episode VI: Return of the Jedi (1981)
description: Bothered by the construction of the new Death Star and a shield generator by the Galactic Empire very close to their beloved home, the Ewoks try to perform a sacrifice with any foreign visitors. That's how the Rebels Luke Skywalker, Leia Organa and Han Solo get caught and became prisoners before Sora and his friends appear to save them. After clearing all the misunderstandings thanks to C3P0's divine intervention, together with R2-D2 and Chewbacca will face their common enemy, the evil Empire who disturbs the peace of the Galaxy, by infiltrating into the Death Star and defeating Darth Vader, corrupted by the Dark Side of the Force.
